LearningRule.name: LearningRule
LearningRule.description: Represents a junction between the Learning and Rule (Expression Set) objects for an extensible rule on a learning.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency.

Description.description: The description of the Learning Rule.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearningId.description: The parent Learning related to the Learning Rule.

Name.description: The name of the Learning Rule.

RuleId.description: The Rule (expression set) related to the Learning Rule.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the Learning Rule.
